#### Trabajo con remotes

#### Revertir cambios

```bash

# Quitar de staging area

# Revertir commits
```

### Workflows de equipo

#### Feature branch workflow

```bash
# 1. Crear feature branch desde main actualizado

git pull origin main
git checkout -b feature/nueva-funcionalidad

# 2. Desarrollar y commitear

# 3. Actualizar con cambios de main

# 4. Push de feature branch

# 5. Crear Pull Request en GitHub/GitLab

git branch -d feature/nueva-funcionalidad
```

#### Git flow

```bash
# Branches principales: main, develop
# Branches de soporte: feature/, release/, hotfix/

# Iniciar feature
git checkout develop
git checkout -b feature/nueva-caracteristica

# Finalizar feature
git checkout develop
git merge --no-ff feature/nueva-caracteristica

# Release branch
git checkout -b release/1.2.0 develop
# Fix bugs, actualizar versi√≥n
git checkout main
git merge --no-ff release/1.2.0
git tag -a v1.2.0 -m "Version 1.2.0"
git checkout develop
git merge --no-ff release/1.2.0
```

```bash
#!/bin/bash
```

#### Release automation

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# Script para crear release autom√°ticamente

version="$1"
if [ -z "$version" ]; then
    echo "Uso: $0 <version>"
    exit 1
fi

# Crear tag
git tag -a "v$version" -m "Version $version"
git push origin "v$version"

# Generar changelog autom√°tico
changelog=$(gh api repos/:owner/:repo/releases/generate-notes \
    -f tag_name="v$version" \
    --jq .body)

# Crear release
gh release create "v$version" \
    --title "Release v$version" \
    --notes "$changelog" \
    --draft=false \
    --prerelease=false

echo "Release v$version creado exitosamente!"
```

```javascript
#!/usr/bin/env node
// build-tool.js
const fs = require('fs/promises');
const path = require('path');
const { execSync } = require('child_process');

async function buildProject() {
    console.log('üöÄ Iniciando build...');
    
    // Limpiar directorio dist
    await fs.rmdir('./dist', { recursive: true }).catch(() => {});
    await fs.mkdir('./dist', { recursive: true });
    
    // Compilar TypeScript
    console.log('üìù Compilando TypeScript...');
    execSync('tsc --outDir dist');
    
    // Copiar assets
    console.log('üìÅ Copiando assets...');
    await fs.cp('./src/assets', './dist/assets', { recursive: true });
    
    // Generar package.json para producci√≥n
    const pkg = JSON.parse(await fs.readFile('./package.json', 'utf8'));
    const prodPkg = {
        name: pkg.name,
        version: pkg.version,
        dependencies: pkg.dependencies,
        main: 'index.js'
    };
    await fs.writeFile('./dist/package.json', JSON.stringify(prodPkg, null, 2));
    
    console.log('‚úÖ Build completado!');
}

buildProject().catch(console.error);
```

## Workflows integrados

### Desarrollo Full-Stack

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# Script de desarrollo completo

# 1. Clonar y configurar proyecto
clone_and_setup() {
    gh repo clone mi-org/mi-proyecto
    cd mi-proyecto
    
    # Instalar dependencias
    npm install
    
    # Configurar git hooks
    npx husky install
    
    # Crear branch de desarrollo
    git checkout -b feature/nueva-funcionalidad
}

# 2. Desarrollo con live reload
dev_server() {
    # Terminal 1: Backend
    npm run dev:server &
    
    # Terminal 2: Frontend
    npm run dev:client &
    
    # Terminal 3: Tests en watch mode
    npm run test:watch &
    
    wait
}

# 3. Pre-commit workflow
pre_commit() {
    # Linting
    npm run lint:fix
    
    # Formateo
    npm run format
    
    # Tests
    npm test
    
    # Type checking
    npm run type-check
    
    if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
        echo "‚úÖ Todo OK, procediendo con commit"
        git add .
        git commit -m "$1"
    else
        echo "‚ùå Errores encontrados, revisar antes de commit"
        exit 1
    fi
}

# 4. Deploy workflow
deploy() {
    # Build de producci√≥n
    npm run build
    
    # Push y crear PR
    git push -u origin "$(git branch --show-current)"
    gh pr create --title "Deploy: $(date +%Y-%m-%d)" --body "Release autom√°tico"
    
    # Esperar aprobaci√≥n y merge
    pr_number=$(gh pr view --json number --jq .number)
    echo "PR #$pr_number creado. Esperando aprobaci√≥n..."
}
```

### Git workflow avanzado

```bash
#!/bin/bash
# Workflow completo de Git con integraci√≥n GitHub

git_workflow() {
    local issue_number="$1"
    local feature_name="$2"
    
    if [ -z "$issue_number" ] || [ -z "$feature_name" ]; then
        echo "Uso: git_workflow <issue_number> <feature_name>"
        return 1
    fi
    
    # 1. Actualizar main
    git checkout main
    git pull origin main
    
    # 2. Crear branch desde issue
    branch_name="feature/${issue_number}-${feature_name}"
    git checkout -b "$branch_name"
    
    # 3. Configurar tracking
    git push -u origin "$branch_name"
    
    # 4. Asociar con issue
    gh issue edit "$issue_number" --add-assignee @me
    gh issue comment "$issue_number" --body "üöß Trabajando en branch: $branch_name"
    
    echo "‚úÖ Branch $branch_name creado y asociado con issue #$issue_number"
    echo "üí° Cuando termines, ejecuta: finish_feature $issue_number"
}

finish_feature() {
    local issue_number="$1"
    
    # 1. Push final
    git push origin "$(git branch --show-current)"
    
    # 2. Crear PR que cierre el issue
    gh pr create \
        --title "Resolve #$issue_number" \
        --body "Closes #$issue_number" \
        --reviewer team-leads
    
    # 3. Comentar en issue
    pr_url=$(gh pr view --json url --jq .url)
    gh issue comment "$issue_number" --body "üéâ PR creado: $pr_url"
    
    echo "‚úÖ PR creado. Revisa en: $pr_url"
}

# Usar: git_workflow 123 user-authentication
```

::: {.callout-tip}
## Tips para desarrollo eficiente
- Configura aliases de Git para comandos frecuentes
- Usa `gh` para automatizar workflows de GitHub
- Combina `git hooks` con `husky` para validaciones autom√°ticas
- Mant√©n commits at√≥micos y mensajes descriptivos siguiendo Conventional Commits
:::

::: {.callout-important}
## Mejores pr√°cticas
- Nunca hagas `push --force` en branches compartidos
- Usa `--force-with-lease` en lugar de `--force` cuando sea necesario
- Mant√©n historial limpio con `rebase` interactivo antes de merge
- Configura firma GPG para commits verificados
:::
